person.persName: Reuben Reasor (Union County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Reasor and Rebecca Reasor. Married to Sarah Whitecotton Reasor in Union County, Kentucky, on July 24, 1855. Resident in Bullitt County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Served in the 10th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as private and corporal from August 20, 1862 to February 15, 1865. Captured at Cheshire, Gallia County, Ohio, on July 20, 1863. Prisoner of war at Camp Douglas, Illinois, from August 22, 1863, to February 15, 1865. Signed a loyalty oath to the U.S. government on February 16, 1865.
